doc.field: This dataset depicts at grade rail crossings current as of February 18th, 2011 as managed by the Minnesota Department of Transportation. This dataset was delivered to the TCC to be loaded into the Transit Master system. Crossing IDs and rail company abbreviations are original to the file. Contact information was added and supplied by Meredith Tvrdik (TCC Supervisor).

<?xml version="1.0"?><metadata><eainfo><overview><eaover>USDOTNO: A unique crossing ID assigned the the USDOT
MAIN_RR_OP: The abbreviation of the rail company who owns the track
FULL_NAME: The full name of the rail company
PHONE_NUM: Phone contact information
CONTACT: All contact information in one field as required by TCC</eaover></overview></eainfo><idinfo><citation><citeinfo><origin>Metropolitan Council - Metro Transit</origin><title>AtGradeRailCrossings</title><pubinfo><publish>Metropolitan Council - Metro Transit</publish></pubinfo><pubdate>20110218</pubdate><onlink>ftp://gisftp.metc.state.mn.us/BusRouteAndRailroadIntersections.zip</onlink></citeinfo></citation><descript><abstract>This dataset depicts at grade rail crossings current as of February 18th, 2011 as managed by the Minnesota Department of Transportation. This dataset was delivered to the TCC to be loaded into the Transit Master system. Crossing IDs and rail company abbreviations are original to the file. Contact information was added and supplied by Meredith Tvrdik (TCC Supervisor). </abstract><purpose>The purpose of this dataset is to give approximate locations of at grade transit and rail crossing and provide quick access to contact information to TCC staff</purpose><supplinf>Twin Cities 7 county metropolitan area. This includes the counties of Anoka, Carver, Dakota, Hennepin, Ramsey, Scott and Washington.</supplinf></descript><browse><browsen>none available</browsen></browse><crossref><citeinfo><title>none</title></citeinfo></crossref><timeperd><current>This dataset is current as listed in the Time Period of Content section</current><timeinfo><sngdate><caldate>20110218</caldate></sngdate></timeinfo></timeperd><status><progress>Complete</progress><update>As Needed</update></status><spdom><bounding><westbc>-94.012</westbc><eastbc>-92.732</eastbc><northbc>45.415</northbc><southbc>44.471</southbc></bounding></spdom><accconst>None</accconst><useconst>None</useconst><ptcontac><cntinfo><cntperp><cntorg>Metropolitan Council - Metro Transit</cntorg><cntper>Steve Baisden</cntper></cntperp><cntpos>Associate Planner</cntpos><cntaddr><address>560 6th Ave N</address><city>Minneapolis</city><state>MN</state><postal>55411</postal></cntaddr><cntvoice>612.349.7361</cntvoice><cntemail>stephen.baisden@metrotransit.org</cntemail></cntinfo></ptcontac></idinfo><dataqual><complete>Entire 7 county area is covered.</complete><posacc><horizpa><horizpar>Unknown</horizpar></horizpa></posacc><attracc><attraccr>Unknown</attraccr></attracc><lineage><procstep><procdesc>This dataset was sent to Jon Hoekenga February 18th, 2011 from George Thibault (Rail Project Manager). Points were clipped to the extent of the transit network and at grade crossing were extracted. Rail Company contact information was added at the request of TCC and provided by Meredith Tvrdik.
Future updates can be obtained using the contact information below:
George Thibault Rail Project Manager Office of Freight & Commercial Vehicle Operations Mail Stop 470, Room 120 395 John Ireland Blvd St Paul, MN 55155-1899 Office 651 366-3708 Fax 651 366-3720 E-Mail george.thibault@state.mn.us
</procdesc></procstep></lineage></dataqual><distinfo><distliab>NOTICE: The Geographic Information System (GIS) Data to which this notice is attached are made available pursuant to the Minnesota Government Data Practices Act (Minnesota Statutes Chapter 13). Doing so will tell your browser to download a 'ZIP' file which will contain the following:
- ArcView shape files - metadata for the dataset (.htm) - NOTICE.RTF, an important notice about this dataset that can be read by any word processing software.
Additionally, this dataset is available for direct use via one or more map services. More information about what a map service is can be found at http://www.datafinder.org/services/. The specific map service and layer name for this dataset can be found by clicking the "Services" link for this dataset in the DataFinder Catalog at http://www.datafinder.org/catalog/ .</ordering></stdorder><distrib><cntinfo><cntperp><cntorg>Metropolitan Council</cntorg><cntper>Jon Hoekenga</cntper></cntperp><cntpos>GIS Specialist</cntpos><cntaddr><address>390 Robert Street North</address><city>St. Paul</city><state>MN</state><postal>55101-1805</postal></cntaddr><cntvoice>651.602.1561</cntvoice><cntemail>jonathan.hoekenga@metc.state.mn.us</cntemail></cntinfo></distrib></distinfo><metainfo><metd>20120326</metd><metstdn>Minnesota Geographic Metadata Guidelines</metstdn><metstdv>1.2</metstdv><metextns><onlink>http://www.mngeo.state.mn.us/committee/standards/mgmg/metadata.htm</onlink></metextns><metc><cntinfo><cntperp><cntorg>Metropolitan Council - Metro Transit</cntorg><cntper>Steve Baisden</cntper></cntperp><cntpos>Associate Planner</cntpos><cntaddr><address>560 6th Ave N</address><city>Minneapolis</city><state>MN</state><postal>55411</postal></cntaddr><cntvoice>612.349.7361</cntvoice><cntemail>stephen.baisden@metrotransit.org</cntemail></cntinfo></metc></metainfo><spref><horizsys><planar><gridsys><gridsysn>Universal Transverse Mercator</gridsysn><utm><utmzone>15</utmzone></utm></gridsys><planci><plandu>meters</plandu></planci></planar><geodetic><horizdn>NAD83</horizdn><ellips>GRS80</ellips></geodetic></horizsys></spref></metadata>
